thought: To craft cyan_carpet, I need to craft cyan_dye first. This requires placing a blue dye and a green dye next to each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving the blue dye from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
